red_house_talk_to_mom.name: Talking to Mom
red_house_talk_to_mom.desc:
Your mom looks at you. 
'Oh dear... just look at you
all messed up...
Why don't you and your pokemon take a quick rest?

choose_starter_bulbasaur.name: Choose Bulbasaur
choose_starter_bulbasaur.desc:
The grass pokemon Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. 
There is a seed on its back. 
By soaking up the sun rays, the seed grows progressively larger.

choose_starter_squirtle.name: Choose Squirtle
choose_starter_squirtle.desc:
A Squirtle shell is not merely used for protection. 
The rounded shape and grooves on its surface help minimize resistance in water, enabling this Pokémon to swim at high speeds.
